aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.text: My name is Eduardo Fanis Lima, I am currently 18 years old and live in Curitiba, PR, Brazil. I am a self-taught technology enthusiast since I was 10 years old. I always enjoyed inventing things and learning in practive, and at an early age, I already knew how to assemble and maintain computers. Today, I am a Front-end Developer and UI Designer, sketching my ideas and turning them into reality.

letsWorkTogether.title: Lets work together
letsWorkTogether.text: Send me a message on my email and together we will turn your ideas into beautiful UIs.

aboutMe.title: About me
aboutMe.myName: My name is Eduardo Fanis Lima,
aboutMe.text1: I am currently 18 years old and live in Curitiba, PR, Brazil. I am a self-taught technology enthusiast since I was 10 years old. I always enjoyed inventing things and learning in practive, and at an early age, I already knew how to assemble and maintain computers. Today, I am a Front-end Developer and UI Designer, sketching my ideas and turning them into reality.
aboutMe.text2: I have a passion for classic cars, sports cars, and sport motorcycles. My dream car is a 1990s Porsche 911. I enjoy working out and practicing combat sports (boxing and kickboxing) in my free time.
aboutMe.text3: I dove into the world of programming about two years ago. I always knew I wanted to work with technology. When I started writing my first lines of code and saw the things I could build myself, I was fascinated and knew that this was what I wanted to do.

stack.title: Stack
stack.description: Technologies and tools that I have experience with.

projectsDescriptions.gerencie: Web app to manage costumers & money operations.
projectsDescriptions.dogs: A social media like Instagram, but for dogs.
projectsDescriptions.nextchat: Text messaging app made in NextJS.
projectsDescriptions.nextchatapi: Text messaging NodeJS API with MongoDB for my project Next Chat.
projectsDescriptions.notionpomodoro: A Pomodoro app to use with Notion Embed URL
